data.title: Brown v. Wier et al
authors: US District Court for the Eastern District of Kentucky
data.meta_description: Prisoner: Civil Rights case filed on March 11, 2024  in the Kentucky Eastern District Court
data.text: May 3, 2024 Filing 15 Letter from Terrance Brown, pro se, re pending change of address, civil complaint and 6CCA case no. 24-5386. (Attachments: #1 Envelope pm 4/30/2024) (RCB) May 3, 2024 CLERK'S VIRTUAL NOTICE TO Terrance Brown re #15 Letter: In response to a request for the status of your case, a courtesy copy of the docket sheet in the above-styled case is enclosed. The docket sheet provides a timeline of the activity in your case with a list of filings in the case to date. cc: Terrance Brown by US Mail (RCB) April 23, 2024 Filing 14 ORDER: 1. Brown's motion to proceed in forma pauperis on appeal #11 is GRANTED. 2. Within 28 days, Brown must pay $28.10 to Clerk an initial partial filing fee. 3. Clerk shall open an account in Brown's name for receipt of filing fee. Clerk shall complete a Notice of Payment Form (Form EDKY 525). Clerk shall serve a copy of this Order and Notice of Payment Form upon Jailer/Warden of institution in which Brown is currently confined and to Clerk 6CCA. 4. Each month Brown's custodian shall send Clerk a payment in an amount equal to 20% of his income for preceding month, until the entire $605.00 filing fee is paid. 5. Clerk shall send a copy of this Order to Clerk of 6CCA. Signed by Judge Karen K. Caldwell on 4/23/2024. (Attachments: #1 Notice of Payment Form) (RCB)cc: COR, Finance, Clerk 6CCA, Warden USP Big Sandy w/EDKY 525 and Terrance Brown by US Mail April 23, 2024 Filing 13 USCA Case Number 24-5386, Case Manager Gretchen S. Abruzzo, for #10 Notice of Appeal filed by Terrance Brown. (RCB) April 22, 2024 Filing 12 Prisoner Trust Fund Account Statement, filed by Terrance Brown pro se. (TDA) April 22, 2024 Filing 11 MOTION for Leave to Appeal in forma pauperis, filed by Terrance Brown pro se. Motion referred to PSO. (TDA) April 22, 2024 Filing 10 NOTICE OF APPEAL as to #8 Memorandum Opinion & Order & #9 Judgment, by Terrance Brown pro se. (SHORT RECORD MAILED to Brown). (Attachments: #1 Envelope Not Postmarked)(TDA)cc: Brown, 6CCA April 22, 2024 ***MOTION SUBMITTED TO CHAMBERS of PSO for review: re #11 MOTION for Leave to Appeal in forma pauperis by Terrance Brown. (TDA) April 2, 2024 Filing 9 JUDGMENT: 1. Plas Complaint (R. #1 ) is DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE; 2. This action is DISMISSED and STRICKEN from Court's docket; and 3. This is a FINAL and APPEALABLE Judgment and there is no just cause for delay. Signed by Judge Karen K. Caldwell on 4/2/2024. (TDA) cc: Terrance Brown by US Mail April 2, 2024 Filing 8 MEMORANDUM OPINION & ORDER: 1. Brown's Motion to Appoint New Judge for Action (R. #3 ) is DENIED as moot; 2. Brown's Complaint (R. #1 ) is DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE; 3. This action is DISMISSED and STRICKEN from Court's docket. 4. A corresponding Judgment will be entered this date. Signed by Judge Karen K. Caldwell on 4/2/2024. (TDA) cc: Terrance Brown by US Mail March 22, 2024 Filing 7 Letter from Terrance Brown, pro se, requesting GO 22-19. (Attachments: #1 Letter requesting forms, #2 Envelope pm 3/20/2024) (RCB) March 22, 2024 CLERK'S VIRTUAL NOTICE TO Terrance Brown re #7 Letter: Please find enclosed a free copy of the General Order 22-19, Notice of Appeal form and Motion for Pauper Status with Certificate of Inmate Account forms in response to your request. cc: Terrance Brown by US Mail (RCB) March 13, 2024 Filing 5 ORDER: 1. Pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 455(a), undersigned RECUSES himself from service in this action; and 2. Clerk shall REASSIGN this action by random draw in accordance with Court's General Order 22-19, Case Assignment and Recusal Order, entered on December 22, 2022. Signed by Judge Robert E. Wier on 3/13/2024. (RCB) cc: COR and Terrance Brown by US Mail March 11, 2024 Filing 4 IMPORTANT NOTICE to Pro Se Filer: Information relating to pro se filings and F.R.Civ.P. 5.2 requiring personal identifiers be partially redacted from documents filed with the court. #Click here for more information on the rules. It is the sole responsibility of counsel and the parties to comply with the rules requiring redaction of personal data identifiers.cc: pro se filer via U.S. Mail (Attachments: #1 Sample Caption)(RCB) March 11, 2024 Filing 3 MOTION to Appoint New Judge for Action by Terrance Brown, pro se. Motions referred to PSO. (Attachments: #1 Envelope pm 3/5/2024) (RCB) March 11, 2024 Filing 1 COMPLAINT filed by Terrance Brown, pro se. (Filing fee $405; receipt number 700000642) (Attachments: #1 Envelope pm 3/5/2024, #2 Receipt - Filing Fee)(RCB) March 11, 2024 ***MOTION SUBMITTED TO CHAMBERS of PSO for review: re #3 MOTION to Appoint New Judge for Action by Terrance Brown (RCB) March 11, 2024 ***FILE SUBMITTED TO CHAMBERS of PSO for review: #1 Complaint (RCB)
